title: innocent drinks on Twitter: "THE LAST STRAW At least, the last plastic ...
body: THE LAST STRAW At least, the last plastic one. We've swapped our plastic straws for paper ones. Don't worry - they've been tested for optimum sippleness, slurpometrics, and suckability, meaning there's still all the tasty smoothie you love, but less of the plastic. read image description. ALT. 10:39 AM · May 26, 2021. 6.

THE LAST STRAW
At least, the last plastic one. We’ve swapped our plastic straws for paper ones. Don’t worry - they’ve been tested for optimum sippleness, slurpometrics, and suckability, meaning there’s still all the tasty smoothie you love, but less of the plastic.
